welcome_message_body: Welcome to Atibaia, Brazil! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its stunning landscapes, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Atibaia has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Doceria Denny's
restaurants.description: Doceria Denny's is a bagel shop located in Atibaia.
restaurants.address: Av. 9 de Julho, 135 (R. Bartholomeu Peranovich), Atibaia, SP

restaurants.address: Rua José Lucas 81 Centro (Na rua das Igrejas), Atibaia, SP, 12940-700
